languages.text: {n}Губы Маражая растягиваются в приторной улыбке.{/n} "Моя бедная старшая сестра, тебе до сих пор не дает покоя мое появление на свет... впрочем, следует ли удивляться? Сложно придумать более наглядное доказательство того, что наша мать сочла первую попытку продолжить род неудачной".

{n}Marazhai's lips stretch into a saccharine smile.{/n} "My poor older sister, you still cannot stand the fact that I was born... but how can I be surprised? It is hard to think of more glaring proof that our mother considered her first attempt to continue the line a failure."
languages.original_text: {n}Губы Маражая растягиваются в приторной улыбке.{/n} "Моя бедная старшая сестра, тебе до сих пор не дает покоя мое появление на свет... впрочем, следует ли удивляться? Сложно придумать более наглядное доказательство того, что наша мать сочла первую попытку продолжить род неудачной".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai's lips stretch into a saccharine smile.{/n} "My poor older sister, you still cannot stand the fact that I was born... but how can I be surprised? It is hard to think of more glaring proof that our mother considered her first attempt to continue the line a failure."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai's lips stretch into a saccharine smile.{/n} "My poor older sister, you still cannot stand the fact that I was born... but how can I be surprised? It is hard to think of more glaring proof that our mother considered her first attempt to continue the line a failure."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋咧开嘴，露出了甜蜜的笑容。{/n}“我可怜的姐姐，你到现在都无法接受我存在的事实……不过，这又有什么好惊讶的呢？恐怕没有比这更明显的证据，证明我们的母亲首次延续血脉的尝试失败之举。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's lips stretch into a saccharine smile.{/n} "My poor older sister, you still cannot stand the fact that I was born... but how can I be surprised? It is hard to think of more glaring proof that our mother considered her first attempt to continue the line a failure."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋咧开嘴，露出了甜蜜的笑容。{/n}“我可怜的妹妹，你到现在都无法接受我存在的事实……不过，这又有什么好惊讶的呢？恐怕没有比这更明显的证据，证明我们的母亲第二次延续血脉的尝是失败之举。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Les lèvres de Marazhai s'étirent en un sourire mielleux.{/n} « Ma pauvre sœur, vous m'en voulez toujours d'être né... mais comment pourrait-il en être autrement ? Je suis la preuve vivante que notre mère a considéré sa première tentative pour préserver sa lignée comme un échec retentissant. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's lips stretch into a saccharine smile.{/n} "My poor older sister, you still cannot stand the fact that I was born... but how can I be surprised? It is hard to think of more glaring proof that our mother considered her first attempt to continue the line a failure."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les lèvres de Marazhai s'étirent en un sourire mielleux.{/n} « Ma pauvre sœur, vous m'en voulez toujours d'être né... mais comment pourrait-il en être autrement ? Je suis la preuve vivante que notre mère a considéré sa première tentative pour préserver sa lignée comme un échec retentissant. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Los labios de Marazhai forman una sonrisa empalagosa.{/n} «Mi queridísima hermana mayor, todavía me guardas rencor por haber nacido... pero ¿acaso me sorprende? Es difícil pensar en una prueba más evidente de que nuestra madre consideró un fracaso su primer intento de prolongar el linaje».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's lips stretch into a saccharine smile.{/n} "My poor older sister, you still cannot stand the fact that I was born... but how can I be surprised? It is hard to think of more glaring proof that our mother considered her first attempt to continue the line a failure."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los labios de Marazhai forman una sonrisa empalagosa.{/n} «Mi queridísima hermana mayor, todavía me guardas rencor por haber nacido... pero ¿acaso me sorprende? Es difícil pensar en una prueba más evidente de que nuestra madre consideró un fracaso su primer intento de prolongar el linaje».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイの唇が引きつり、甘ったるい笑みに変わる。{/n}「かわいそうな姉よ、まだ俺が生まれたという事実に耐えられないのか…まあ、驚くことでもないが。俺たちの母親が家系を残す最初の試みを失敗だったと考えた確たる証拠は、この俺以上にないんだからな」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's lips stretch into a saccharine smile.{/n} "My poor older sister, you still cannot stand the fact that I was born... but how can I be surprised? It is hard to think of more glaring proof that our mother considered her first attempt to continue the line a failure."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイの唇が引きつり、甘ったるい笑みに変わる。{/n}「かわいそうな姉よ、まだ俺が生まれたという事実に耐えられないのか…まあ、驚くことでもないが。俺たちの母親が家系を残す最初の試みを失敗だったと考えた確たる証拠は、この俺以上にないんだからな」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhais Lippen verziehen sich zu einem zuckersüßen Grinsen.{/n} "Meine arme ältere Schwester, Ihr könnt es noch immer nicht ertragen, dass ich geboren wurde ... doch wie kann mich das überraschen? Es kann wohl kaum einen deutlicheren Beweis geben, dass unsere Mutter ihren ersten Versuch, die Linie fortzusetzen, als Fehlschlag angesehen hat."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's lips stretch into a saccharine smile.{/n} "My poor older sister, you still cannot stand the fact that I was born... but how can I be surprised? It is hard to think of more glaring proof that our mother considered her first attempt to continue the line a failure."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhais Lippen verziehen sich zu einem zuckersüßen Grinsen.{/n} "Meine arme ältere Schwester, Ihr könnt es noch immer nicht ertragen, dass ich geboren wurde ... doch wie kann mich das überraschen? Es kann wohl kaum einen deutlicheren Beweis geben, dass unsere Mutter ihren ersten Versuch, die Linie fortzusetzen, als Fehlschlag angesehen hat."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın dudaklarına çok sevimli bir gülümseme yerleşiyor.{/n} "Benim zavallı ablacığım, doğmuş olduğum gerçeğine hâlâ katlanamıyorsun. Buna şaşırmak ne mümkün... Annemizin, soyunu devam ettirmek konusundaki ilk teşebbüsünü başarısızlık olarak gördüğünün daha net bir kanıtı olabileceğini sanmıyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's lips stretch into a saccharine smile.{/n} "My poor older sister, you still cannot stand the fact that I was born... but how can I be surprised? It is hard to think of more glaring proof that our mother considered her first attempt to continue the line a failure."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai'ın dudaklarına çok sevimli bir gülümseme yerleşiyor.{/n} "Benim zavallı ablacığım, doğmuş olduğum gerçeğine hâlâ katlanamıyorsun ama buna şaşırmam mümkün mü? Annemizin, soyunu devam ettirmek konusundaki ilk teşebbüsünü başarısızlık olarak gördüğünün daha net bir kanıtı olabileceğini sanmıyorum."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
